snippet: ISIS, the militant group that controls large parts of Iraq and Syria, has distributed a recruiting video using Andre Poulin, a Canadian who converted to Islam and later died in battle.
abstract: Video featuring Canadian Andre Poulin is believed to be one of the first pieces of media in which militant group Islamic State in Iraq and Syria, or ISIS, uses an English-speaking North American to try to lure others to fight on its side; ISIS is known for having one of the slickest and most aggressive media operations in the Islamic world.
